In England, in the seven days to 04 July, there were 155,127 new confirmed cases (275.6 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 27 June, there were 97,325 new cases and so the new cases have risen by 59% (57,802 extra cases). The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 09 July is 4,393,205 (7,805 cases per 100,000 population).
